text: @Liberaler_Leo: 🔄🇪🇺 Winter is coming, and with it, the threat of higher energy prices for Europe! 🤯 Russia's contract to supply gas to Europe via Ukraine ends this year, and a cold winter could create a "worst case" scenario for countries reliant on transit through Ukraine. 🥶🇷🇺But don't worry, EU energy ministers are meeting in Brussels today to discuss energy security issues for winter 2024-2025! 💡🇪🇺 We must work together to ensure a stable and affordable energy supply for all Europeans! 💪🏼🌟 Let's abandon Russian gas and embrace a greener, more sustainable future! 🌱💚
